meta.title: Contract #019: Ghost Signal
meta.description: BLACKOUT: Signal analysis. Use Simultaneity to identify the source of the jam.
meta.journal: The Raid Team didn't lose comms because of a 'dead zone.' An IMSI Catcher (Stingray) was active in the apartment above. It jammed the police band while simultaneously intercepting the warning text to the suspect.

nodes.text: --:-- - Suspect Phone: Incoming Text 'GET OUT NOW'.
--:-- - Rear Camera: Suspect flees via fire escape.
--:-- - Tech Report: 'Radio batteries failed due to cold.'
